description.plain:
The Staves, hailing from Hertfordshire, England, are an  acoustic folk rock trio of sisters.

They first gained popularity whilst supporting The Civil Wars in January 2012, and further developed their fan-base supporting Bon Iver in their May/June 2012 tour.

The band’s debut album, Dead & Born & Grown, was released in November 2012 and produced with Glyn Johns and Ethan Johns.

The second full length album, If I Was, was released 23 March 2015. The album debuted at #14 on the Official UK Album Chart.
